Sentencas: Yttria doped zirconia has been widely used as electrolyte materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Characterization of YSZ solid oxide fuel cells electrolyte deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying and low pressure plasma spraying

Sentencas: Plasma spraying is a cost-effective process to deposit YSZ electrolyte.
Titulo: Characterization of YSZ solid oxide fuel cells electrolyte deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying and low pressure plasma spraying

Sentencas: In this study, the 8 mol% Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 (YSZ) layer was deposited by low pressure plasma spraying (LPPS) and atmospheric plasma spraying (APS) with fused-crushed and agglomerated powders to examine the effect of spray method and particle size on the electrical conductivity and gas permeability of YSZ coating.
Titulo: Characterization of YSZ solid oxide fuel cells electrolyte deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying and low pressure plasma spraying

Sentencas: The microstructure of YSZ coating was characterized by scanning electron microscopy and x-ray diffraction analysis.
Titulo: Characterization of YSZ solid oxide fuel cells electrolyte deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying and low pressure plasma spraying

Sentencas: The results showed that the gas permeability was significantly influenced by powder structure.
Titulo: Characterization of YSZ solid oxide fuel cells electrolyte deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying and low pressure plasma spraying

Sentencas: The gas permeability of YSZ coating deposited by fused-crushed powder is one order lower in magnitude than that by agglomerated powder.
Titulo: Characterization of YSZ solid oxide fuel cells electrolyte deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying and low pressure plasma spraying

Sentencas: Moreover, the gas permeability of YSZ deposited by LPPS is lower than that of APS YSZ.
Titulo: Characterization of YSZ solid oxide fuel cells electrolyte deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying and low pressure plasma spraying

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the deposits through thickness direction was measured by potentiostat/galvanostat based on three-electrode assembly approach.
Titulo: Characterization of YSZ solid oxide fuel cells electrolyte deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying and low pressure plasma spraying

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of YSZ coating deposited by low pressure plasma spraying with fused-crushed powder of small particle size was 0.043 S cm(-1) at 1000 degrees C, which is about 20% higher than that of atmospheric plasma spraying YSZ with the same powder.
Titulo: Characterization of YSZ solid oxide fuel cells electrolyte deposited by atmospheric plasma spraying and low pressure plasma spraying
